title: SEO SoS: Search Engine Optimization First Aid Guide
description: Using a tongue-in-cheek First Aid Manual approach to address website search engine optimization health issues, the aim of this book is to help not only those with an established online business that is not delivering the desired results, but also those that wish to create a new successful online business, but lack the resources, usually only available to larger organizations. Also included within this publication are a number of tips and industry secrets that could benefit even the most seasoned "internet marketer." .This book aims to be your starting point to help you identify SEO concepts and practices that are vital for healthy online success, while avoiding the waste of time, resources and money associated with performing tasks that prove to be of little or no overall benefit in terms of increased "website traffic" or sales.
author: Darren Varndell
